text: YOU: Hi Mimi, can you tell me something cool that Yousra has done in the past few months? MIMI: Lately, Yousra has been really interested in music, so she's been watching tutorials on YouTube for piano playing in her spare time. I am sure she will start posting songs' covers soon! YOU: That's so cool! Thanks Mimi. MIMI: My pleasure! Take care!
notMyTurn: MIMI: I think Alice wanted to talk to you...
